story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_0100_10: Your evil scheme ends here, Giovanni!
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_0200_10: I’m not saying power’s a bad thing...
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_0300_10:
And I think it’s fine to pursue it, no matter
what kind it is. That’s up to you as a
sync pair.
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_0500_10:
But some people get obsessed with the kind
of power you talk about, and they go down
the wrong path.
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_0600_10: That’s why we have to guide them!
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_0800_10:
But what are words worth if not backed
by results?
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I’ll show you people and Pokémon helping
each other and deepening their bonds.
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_1100_10:
And what it means to be a proper Trainer!
AND what it’s like to master the path you’ve
chosen, together with Pokémon!
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_1200_10: So this is how arc suits awaken...?
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_1600_10:
I suppose I’ll have to be careful of you too
now in the future. Not just Red.
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_1700_10:
That won’t be enough. You’ll have to watch
out for more than just me!
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_1900_10:
I’m not the only one who ruined your plans
today.
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_2000_10:
It’s really all thanks to my dependable
protégés, who lent me their power!
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_2100_10: They’ll get stronger too, so watch your back.
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_2200_10:
You used to be a Gym Leader, so you
get it, right?
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Unless Viridian Gym was just a measly
hideout for Team Rocket.
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_2500_10: I’m the leader of Viridian Gym now.
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_2600_10:
And I’m building a place where Trainers can
learn properly!
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_2800_10:
You do whatever it takes to get your hands
on power.
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_2900_10:
But most Trainers out there are training
little by little, day after day.
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_3000_10: That’s what sets us apart from you.
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_3100_10:
One day, all this power you’ve cast aside is
gonna catch up to you.
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_3300_10: I’ve wasted enough of my time here.
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_3400_10:
There’s no guarantee putting in the effort
will pay off in the end.
story_arceus_07_11000/2401_1001_3600_10:
We’ll keep putting one foot in front of the
other, dreaming of the day everything we
went through makes our dreams come true.
